Package core

Interface IScene

All Known Implementing Classes:
ListUsers, LoginScene, ManageUsers, MenuScene, OrderConstruction, ProfileSettings, RegisterScene, Scene, ShowProfile, ViewConstruction
public interface IScene
Make sure, that every scene has the getSceneID, setDefaultObjects, onActive methods for the scene manager. Also have access methods to ArrayLists for the scenes elements and sprites.

    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> getListOfObjects()  
    java.util.ArrayList<IPainter> getListOfSprites()

    default void onActivate()  
    default void setDefaultValues()
